public class BuilderClassLoader
extends ClassLoader
The BuilderClassLoader is a simple class loader that finds the classes required by the native support.

BuilderClassLoader()
Creates a BuilderClassLoader.

loadClass(String, boolean)
Fulfills the ClassLoader interface.

BuilderClassLoader 
 public BuilderClassLoader()
Creates a BuilderClassLoader.

loadClass 
 public synchronized Class loadClass(String name,
                                     boolean resolve)
Fulfills the ClassLoader interface. This method returns a Class object representing the specified class.

Parameters:
name - The name of the class.
resolve - If true, the class will be resolved.
Returns:
The class.
